kunyomiList.definition: childish, very young- cute if applied to a child, rude if applied to an immature adult.

jukugoList.components: 幼稚 (childish, immature) + 園 (public park) = 幼稚園 (kindergarten)
幼 (childhood) + 稚 (childish) = 幼稚 (childish, immature)
幼 (childhood) + 児 (baby) = 幼児 (child)
玄 (deep profound) + 関 (connected to) = 玄関 (entryway)
玄 (deep profound) + 米 (rice / America) = 玄米 (brown rice)
幽 (occult) + 玄 (deep profound) = 幽玄 (occult)
畜 (raising of domestic animals) + 生 (life / birth) = 畜生 (asshole!)
家 (home) + 畜 (raising of domestic animals) = 家畜 (livestock)

kunyomiList.definition: setting stuff aside for a rainy day. Used about good stuff.

jukugoList.components: 貯 (save up) + 蓄 (store or put aside) = 貯蓄 (savings)
蓄 (store or put aside) + 積 (pile up) = 蓄積 (accumulate.)

kunyomiList.definition: string

jukugoList.components: 紹 (acquaint) + 介 (introduce / intervene) = 紹介 (introduce )
自己 (one's own) + 紹介 (introduce ) = 自己紹介 (introduce yourself to a group.)

kunyomiList.definition: a literal line, like what you'd draw. LAZY

jukugoList.components: 新 (new) + 幹 (trunk) + 線 (line) = 新幹線 (bullet train)

kunyomiList.definition: cotton plants

jukugoList.components: 木 (tree) + 綿 (cotton) + 豆腐 (tofu!) = 木綿豆腐 (firm tofu)

kunyomiList.definition: slender 1/2 KANA
detailed , small, delicate

jukugoList.components: 詳 (expert) + 細 (slender) = 詳細 (details)
細 (slender) + 胞 (cell) = 細胞 (cell)
総 (general　/ total) + 合 (to suit) = 総合 (overall/ integrated)
総 (general　/ total) + 理 (reason) = 総理 (prime minister)

jukugoList.definition: as a whole, XXX. In general .. . XXX
jukugoList.components: 総 (general　/ total) + 体 (body) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 総体的 (as a whole, XXX. In general .. . XXX)
総合 (overall/ integrated) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 総合的 (synthetic)
検 (investigate) + 索 (look up) = 検索 (internet search)
索 (look up) + 引 (pull) = 索引 (index)

kunyomiList.definition: a really narrow, yet weird word: to pay taxes/school fees/bribes; or to place something in the place it's supposed to be: swords in scabbards, mummies in tombs.
to be delivered

jukugoList.components: 納 (to supply) + 得 (bargain　/ obtain) = 納得 (consent)
収 (get) + 納 (to supply) = 収納 (storage)
納 (to supply) + 入 (put/go in) = 納入 (deliver/pay)

kunyomiList.definition: ambiguous
to mistake something for a similar thing, to get diverted off the main point, to be distracted, to . . . KANA

jukugoList.components: 気 (mood) + 紛 (ambiguous) = 気が紛れる (divert attention)

kunyomiList.definition: silk

jukugoList.components: 絹 (silk) + 豆 (bean) + 腐 (rot) = 絹漉し豆腐 (wack tofu)
日 (sun, day) + 系 (group, tribe) = 日系 (of Japanese descent)
太陽 (the fucking sun!) + 系 (group, tribe) = 太陽系 (solar system)
体 (body) + 系 (group, tribe) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 体系的 (systematic)

kunyomiList.definition: grandchild

jukugoList.components: 子 (child) + 孫 (grandchild) = 子孫 (descendant)

kunyomiList.definition: to be involved with, to get caught up in,(usually in a bad thing)

jukugoList.components: 関 (connected to) + 係 (be involved with) = 関係 (related to)

kunyomiList.definition: to dry, but only in the narrow sense of hanging laundry out to dry.

jukugoList.components: 干 (dry out) + 渉 (interfere) = 干渉 (interfere or meddle.)
梅 (plum) + 干 (dry out) = 梅干 (pickled plums)
朝 (morning) + 刊 (edition) = 朝刊 (morning edition)
月 (moon) + 刊 (edition) = 月刊 (monthly)
夕 (evening) + 刊 (edition) = 夕刊 (evening edition)

kunyomiList.definition: To use. (More formal/scientific than つかう） As in, "Please use this pencil to complete the test. NP

jukugoList.components: 用 (utilize) + 事 (action/ incident) = 用事 (errands)
用 (utilize) + 意 (meaning) = 用意 (get set！！)
利 (handy) + 用 (utilize) = 利用 (utilize)

kunyomiList.definition: chutzpah, courage, pluck. (Westerners of either sex believe that their daring and courage live in their balls. Japanese believe it lives in the liver/gallbladder area!)

jukugoList.components: 肝 (liver) + 臓 (internal organ) = 肝臓 (liver)

kunyomiList.definition: potato KANA

jukugoList.components: 焼 (roast / grill) + 芋 (potato) = 焼き芋 (roast potatoes)

kunyomiList.definition: sweat - (to sweat = 汗をかく)

jukugoList.definition: to be stank because you sweat.
jukugoList.components: 汗 (sweat) + 臭 (stinky and dumb xxx!) = 汗臭い (to be stank because you sweat.)
宇宙 (outer space) + 人 (person) = 宇宙人 (alien)
宇 (cosmos) + 宙 (space) = 宇宙 (outer space)
宇宙 (outer space) + 船 (ship) = 宇宙船 (space ship)
千 (thousand) + 円 (yen/circle) + 札 (card / label / bill) = 千円札 (1,000 yen bill)

kunyomiList.definition: tongue

jukugoList.components: 猫 (cat) + 舌 (tongue) = 猫舌 (no hot food for me!)
毒 (poison/ addict) + 舌 (tongue) = 毒舌 (sharp-tongued)

kunyomiList.definition: to chat (BOOBOO; If you want to ask someone if they speak Japanese, Don't ever say "nihongo hanaseru?"- that's strictly NOOB. say "Nihongo SHABERU?" instead)
a story. as in, 'Here's a little story I've got to tell. . . !'

jukugoList.components: 電 (electricity) + 話 (conversation) = 電話 (telephone)
会 (big meeting) + 話 (conversation) = 会話 (conversation)
英 (heroic) + 会話 (conversation) = 英会話 (English conversation school)
話 (conversation) + 題 (topic) = 話題 (theme)
生 (life / birth) + 活 (vivid, lively) = 生活 (lifestyle)
活 (vivid, lively) + 動 (movement) = 活動 (activity )
活 (vivid, lively) + 躍 (jump) = 活躍 (active career)

kunyomiList.definition: to quit 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 辞 (quit) + 書 (write) = 辞書 (dictionary)
世 (society) + 辞 (quit) = 世辞 (flattery)

kunyomiList.definition: place for recreation and relaxation - 99% used in the following one expression: 憩いの場 (ikoi no basho).

jukugoList.components: 休 (rest) + 憩 (break at work) = 休憩 (break-time)

kunyomiList.definition: in the middle, halfway (mid-30s, middle of June, mid-century) KANA

jukugoList.components: 時 (time) + 半 (half) = 2時半 (2:30)
半 (half) + 分 (understand / divide / minute) = 半分 (one half)
半 (half) + 年 (year) = 半年 (half a year.)
半 (half) + 額 (amount of money / forehead) = 半額 (half-price)

kunyomiList.definition: A lot of dictionaries still say 判る is a synonym of 分かる. Not really. Don't bother learning 判る.

jukugoList.components: 批 (call bullshit on) + 判 (judgement) = 批判 (criticism)
判 (judgement) + 断 (decision/judgement/refuse) = 判断 (judge)
判 (judgement) + 子 (child) = 判子 (seal)
評 (art or literary criticism) + 判 (judgement) = 評判 (reputation)

kunyomiList.hiragana: ( に　・　を　・　が　 ) ともな*う
kunyomiList.definition: accompany, in both literal and figurative sense: Bill accompanies Doug. But also, rain accompanies high winds at this time of year (notice how it doesn't care about cause and effect)

jukugoList.components: 同 (same) + 伴 (accompany) = 同伴 (accompany)

kunyomiList.definition: flat

jukugoList.components: 平 (equal / level) + 気 (mood) = 平気 (ok?)
平 (equal / level) + 和 (peace/ Japan) = 平和 (peace)
平 (equal / level) + 日 (sun, day) = 平日 (weekday)

jukugoList.definition: fairness (opp. 不公平:ふこうへい)
jukugoList.components: 公 (public) + 平 (equal / level) = 公平 (fairness (opp. 不公平:ふこうへい))
平 (equal / level) + 等 (equal /etc./plural) = 平等 (impartial, even)
評 (art or literary criticism) + 価 (value) = 評価 (price estimate)
評 (art or literary criticism) + 論 (make a case for) = 評論 (critique)
批 (call bullshit on) + 評 (art or literary criticism) = 批評 (review )

kunyomiList.hiragana: ( を or に ) よ＊ぶ
kunyomiList.definition: to call to your friends, on the street. Also, calling the police or ambulance.
To be named, or to be called . If your Pops is sometimes called Twana, you'd say,'パパがTwanaに 呼ばれた。' 1/2 KANA

jukugoList.components: 呼 (call to someone) + 吸 (suck) = 呼吸 (respiration)

kunyomiList.definition: the ground, the soil

jukugoList.components: 土 (earth) + 曜日 (day of week) = 土曜日 (Saturday)
土 (earth) + 産 (childbirth, production of things) = お土産 (souvenir )

kunyomiList.definition: refers to small villages in general, as in "Country life is more peaceful than city life." （BOOBOO: if you want to talk about a particular village, generally you'd say 村　（むら）） 里 also has the nuance of being the village where you are from (used when nostalgic). Also,　you use　里 when a wife leaves her husband - "She went back to the sato."
to measure an amount - used mostly about weight, but also quantity or volume.
quantity LAZY

jukugoList.components: 大 (big) + 量 (quantity) = 大量 (a huge amount)

kunyomiList.definition: black color

jukugoList.components: 黒 (black) + 人 (person) = 黒人 (Black person)
白 (white) + 黒 (black) = 白黒 (black-and-white)

kunyomiList.definition: an archaic, literary/poetic word for child. Usually seen on CDs for childrens' songs: わらべのうた。

jukugoList.definition: a childrens' story or fairy tale
jukugoList.components: 童 (kid) + 話 (conversation) = 童話 (a childrens' story or fairy tale)
童 (kid) + 貞 (chastity) = 童貞 (male virgin)
児 (baby) + 童 (kid) = 児童 (children)

kunyomiList.definition: long for, yearn for (world domination, a soul-mate, revenge) (but usually a soul-mate)
I bury it.
It got buried.

jukugoList.components: 埋 (bury) + 合 (to suit) = 埋め合わせ (compensate for,)

kunyomiList.definition: a casual way to refer to a monk

jukugoList.components: 赤 (red) + 坊 (boy / monk) = 赤ん坊 (baby)
寝 (go to bed) + 坊 (boy / monk) = 寝坊 (sleep late, oversleep)
坊 (boy / monk) + 主 (master/mainly) = 坊主 (Buddhist priest)

kunyomiList.definition: puke (or, emit - as in, "The flaming building emitted gouts of smoke.")

jukugoList.components: 吐 (puke) + 気 (mood) = 吐き気 (nausea)

kunyomiList.definition: after-school cram school

jukugoList.components: 兵 (soldier) + 士 (samurai radical) = 兵士 (infantryman, low-ranking soldier)
武 (military) + 士 (samurai radical) = 武士 (samurai)
力 (strong) + 士 (samurai radical) = 力士 (Sumo rassler)
消 (erase) + 防 (ward off) + 士 (samurai radical) = 消防士 (firefighter)
仕 (work) + 事 (action/ incident) = 仕事 (one's job, one's work. )
仕 (work) + 方 (direction / method / person) = 仕方 (way to do something)

kunyomiList.definition: an ambition or intention

jukugoList.components: 意 (meaning) + 志 (intention, volition) = 意志 (will or volition)
闘 (struggle) + 志 (intention, volition) = 闘志 (fightin' spirit)

kunyomiList.definition: 90% of the time this is only used in fortune-telling. Usually used like this: 吉　（きち）(good omen) or 不吉な兆し　（ふきちなきざし）bad omen LAZY

jukugoList.components: 不 (un) + 吉 (good omen) = 不吉 (inauspicious, dark, ill-omened)

kunyomiList.definition: I cram stuff in.
to be crammed full. Usually said of closets, suitcases or stuffy noses.

jukugoList.components: 鼻 (nose) + 詰 (cram in) = 鼻詰まり (stuffy nose)
詰 (cram in) + 込 (get crowded) = 詰め込む (to cram, jam, pack. )

kunyomiList.definition: tie a knot. tie your shoelaces.

jukugoList.components: 結 (bind) + 局 (department) = 結局 (in the end, or "after all")
結 (bind) + 婚 (marriage) = 結婚 (to marry)
結 (bind) + 果 (fruit　/ result) = 結果 (result)
結 (bind) + 構 (set up / care about) = 結構 (ok / no thanks / very)
雑 (miscellaneous , random) + 誌 (magazine) = 雑誌 (magazine)

kunyomiList.hiragana: ( に　・　を ) ふ*けてる
kunyomiList.definition: to get old, a somewhat perjorative term: Danny Glover saying 'I'm too old for this shit!' - "Dumbledore's getting old, he makes mistakes."Also means "To be a kid but look older than you are."
another word for 'to get old, to age', but without the perjorative connotation of ふける。

jukugoList.components: 老 (get old) + 人 (person) = 老人 (old person.Not rude.)
不 (un) + 孝 (filial piety) + 者 (professional) = 不孝者 (un-filial child!)
親 (parents/kindness) + 孝 (filial piety) + 行 (go) = 親孝行 (filial piety! )

kunyomiList.definition: person SUF

jukugoList.components: 若 (young) + 者 (professional) = 若者 (young person)
記 (diary) + 者 (professional) = 記者 (reporter)
科学 (science) + 者 (professional) = 科学者 (scientist)
芸 (art) + 者 (professional) = 芸者 (geisha)

kunyomiList.definition: remarkable, notable (a striking mismatch between two things, a marked decline in white blood cells, a significant effect on the disease, a glaring weakness, a marked success)

jukugoList.components: 著 (author) + 者 (professional) = 著者 ("this author")
著 (author) + 作 (make) + 権 (rights) = 著作権 (copyright)
一 (one) + 緒 (together) = 一緒 (together)
内 (the inside) + 緒 (together) = 内緒 (confidential)
諸 (various) + 君 (buddy) = 諸君 (Gentlemen!)
警察 (police) + 署 (government office) = 警察署 (police station)
消 (erase) + 防 (ward off) + 署 (government office) = 消防署 (fire station)
署 (government office) + 名 (name, famous) = 署名 (sign an official document)

kunyomiList.definition: hot weather, a place with a hot climate

jukugoList.components: 蒸 (humid) + 暑 (hot place) = 蒸し暑い (humid)

kunyomiList.definition: boil (potato) or simmer (a sauce or stew or onabe)
it gets boiled or cooked

jukugoList.components: 煮 (simmer/stew) + 物 (animal / thing) = 煮物 (boiled food)

kunyomiList.definition: to char or scortch. Like char-broiled beef. Also, often used with hot, passionate emotions: burning with the fiiiire of looooooveeeee!!!!!!!!!!!!
it gets scorched
to be in a hurry, impatient KANA
SUFFIX which turns the previous word into a negative. 金＝money。 金無い＝ no money. KANA

jukugoList.components: 無 (without) + 料 (ingredients / fees) = 無料 (free)
無 (without) + 理 (reason) = 無理 (impossible)

jukugoList.definition: to ignore or snub someone or something.
jukugoList.components: 無 (without) + 視 (peer at) = 無視 (to ignore or snub someone or something.)
無 (without) + 駄 (bad quality) = 無駄 (waste )
維 (upkeep) + 持 (hold) = 維持 (ｍａｉｎｔａｉｎ　ｏｒ　ｓｕｓｔａｉｎ)
維持 (ｍａｉｎｔａｉｎ　ｏｒ　ｓｕｓｔａｉｎ) + 費 (expenses) = 維持費 (maintenance costs.)
唯 (sole or only) + 一 (one) = 唯一 (the only, the sole XXX)

kunyomiList.definition: who???

jukugoList.components: 準 (prepare / criteria) + 備 (furnish) = 準備 (get ready)
基 (basis) + 準 (prepare / criteria) = 基準 (a standard )
規 (criteria) + 準 (prepare / criteria) = 規準 (a criterion)
看 (observe/guard) + 護 (defend) + 師 (master, teacher) = 看護師 (nurse)
弁 (dialect) + 護 (defend) + 士 (samurai radical) = 弁護士 (Defense attorney)
保 (guarantee/maintain ) + 護 (defend) = 保護 (conserve, protect)
護 (defend) + 衛 (defense) = 護衛 (a bodyguard, an escort)

kunyomiList.definition: HORSE

jukugoList.components: 競 (contest) + 馬 (horse) = 競馬 (horse racing)

kunyomiList.definition: I stop it
it gets stopped

jukugoList.components: 中 (middle) + 止 (stop) = 中止 (stop/cancel)
痛 (hurts!!!) + 止 (stop) = 痛み止め (pain-killer,)
雌 (your Moms) + 豚 (pig) = 雌豚 (female pig)
肯 (consent) + 定 (plan) = 肯定 (affirm)

kunyomiList.definition: to walk

jukugoList.components: 歩 (walk) + 道 (street) = 歩道 (sidewalk)
散 (scatter) + 歩 (walk) = 散歩 (a stroll)
歩 (walk) + 行 (go) + 者 (professional) = 歩行者 (pedestrian)
干 (dry out) + 渉 (interfere) = 干渉 (interfere or meddle.)
交 (combine) + 渉 (interfere) = 交渉 (negotiate )

kunyomiList.definition: purple
to be enough. Often used in the negative. XXXが足りない!
means foot AND leg. Oops. They don't have a separate word.

jukugoList.components: 不 (un) + 足 (foot/ be enough) = 不足 (shortage of)
満 (full) + 足 (foot/ be enough) = 満足 (to be totally satisfied.)
足 (foot/ be enough) + 首 (neck) = 足首 (ankle)

kunyomiList.definition: to press or encouarge someone to do something. Could be good, as in "Get up and dance! It's a party! Have some fun!" or bad, as in, "Work faster! If there's time to lean, there's time to clean!"

jukugoList.components: 催 (sponsor) + 促 (peer pressure) = 催促 (repeatedly request)

kunyomiList.definition: tread on
correct, in BOTH senses : literally , as in a correct answer. (Implies that there is ONLY ONE correct one). And figuratively: something that is morally correct or just.

jukugoList.components: 正 (correct) + 直 (correct a probem / direct contact) = 正直 (honest / loyal)
正 (correct) + 解 (solve / untie) = 正解 (correct answer)
正 (correct) + 確 (make certain) = 正確 (precise)
是 (fer shure) + 非 (injustice / mistake) = 是非 (absolutely!)

kunyomiList.definition: to ordain or determine (either a rule, a plan, or a time and place for something).

jukugoList.components: 予 (beforehand) + 定 (plan) = 予定 (an informal plan)
設 (establish) + 定 (plan) = 設定 (establish)
決 (decide) + 定 (plan) = 決定 (make a serious decision)
定 (plan) + 義 (righteousness) = 定義 (definition)

kunyomiList.definition: evidence, testimony . . .: somewhere in between 証明（しょうめい: proof）　and 証拠　（しょうこ: phsyical evidence）. You'd typically use 証 when you're talking about evidence of god such as miracles. Or you'd challenge someone "You say you're honest and give to charity, but do you have any evidence of this?" Unlike 証拠、　証　does not have to be physical, it can be verbal.

jukugoList.hiragana: うんてん めんきょしょ
jukugoList.components: 運転 (drive a vehicle) + 免許 (license) + 証 (proof) = 運転免許証 (drivers' license)
証 (proof) + 拠 (evidence which is the basis for a judgment) = 証拠 (physical evidence)
証 (proof) + 明 (bright) + 書 (write) = 証明書 (legal certification)

kunyomiList.definition: distort or deform.
run

jukugoList.components: 暴 (rampage) + 走 (run) + 族 (family) = 暴走族 (Japanese bikers. )
競 (contest) + 走 (run) = 競走 (race)

kunyomiList.definition: to exceed or go over a certain limit (the cook heated the oven to over 100 degrees, the dude passed 100 years old, the man bet over 40,000 dollars, etc.)
exceed, to go past　（ａ　ｃｉｔｙ，　ａ　ｒｉｖｅｒ　，　ｅｔｃ） also go past in time (survive the winter) or surpass something (wins surpass losses, profits surpass debts).

jukugoList.components: 超 (exceed/ go over) + 自 (my own) + 然 (nature) + 的 (motivation / '-al') = 超自然的 (supernatural)

kunyomiList.definition: station LAZY

jukugoList.components: 駅 (train station) + 員 (clerk) = 駅員 (train station staff. )
各 (each) + 駅 (train station) + 停 (bring to a halt) + 車 (car) = 各駅停車 (local train)

kunyomiList.definition: noon

jukugoList.components: 昼 (noon) + 寝 (go to bed) = 昼寝 (a nap)
昼 (noon) + 休 (rest) = 昼休み (lunch-break )

kunyomiList.definition: the reason for something
kunyomiList.stars: This is not used by itself, only used in expressions, such as "XXX訳だ!!" (so THAT"S the reason!)ｏｒ　”ＸＸＸ訳ではない！”　（It can't effing be!!!） NUBIKANA

jukugoList.components: 言 (say) + 訳 (reason / translation) = 言い訳 (excuse)
申 (humbly say) + 訳 (reason / translation) = 申し訳ない (sorry'n shit)
通 (pass) + 訳 (reason / translation) = 通訳 (simultaneous translation)

kunyomiList.definition: swamp

jukugoList.components: 沢 (swamp / bling) + 山 (mountain) = 沢山 (hell of many. )

kunyomiList.definition: hand

jukugoList.components: 上 (above) + 手 (hand) = 上手 (skilllfully done!)
勝 (win) + 手 (hand) = 勝手 (to do without asking)
下 (below) + 手 (hand) = 下手 (untalented / poor)
苦 (suffer) + 手 (hand) = 苦手 (this is not my thing!)
相 (partner) + 手 (hand) = 相手 (partner)
片 (fragment) + 手 (hand) = 片手 (one-handed)
手 (hand) + 作 (make) = 手作り (handmade)
選 (choose) + 択 (select) = 選択 (to choose)
推 (infer) + 測 (scientific measurment) = 推測 (speculate.)
推 (infer) + 定 (plan) = 推定 (estimate)
推 (infer) + 理 (reason) = 推理 (deductive reasoning, inference.)

kunyomiList.definition: to sketch - a picture, as opposed to the other かく　(書く） which means to write words

jukugoList.components: 描 (depict) + 写 (copy) = 描写 (depiction )
提 (submit a proposal) + 案 (guide/proposal) = 提案 (proposal)
提 (submit a proposal) + 出 (pull out / hand over) = 提出 (hand over / present)

kunyomiList.definition: pay

jukugoList.components: 酔 (drunk) + 払 (pay) = 酔っ払い (drunk)
払 (pay) + 戻 (return) = 払い戻す (refund)
批 (call bullshit on) + 判 (judgement) = 批判 (criticism)
批 (call bullshit on) + 評 (art or literary criticism) = 批評 (review )
